content.question:
The sequence has 7 points labeled.

The points have the following coordinates:

(1 comma 8)

(2 comma 4)

(3 comma 2)

(4 comma 1)

(5 comma one half)

(6 comma one fourth)

(7 comma one eighth)

Values of the terms of a geometric sequence <math alttext="g subscript n"><semantics><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are graphed in the figure. Which of the following is an expression for the <math alttext="n text th end text"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mtext>th</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> term of the geometric sequence?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="g subscript n equals 4 open parentheses 1 half close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g subscript n equals 8 open parentheses 2 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g subscript n equals 8 open parentheses 1 half close parentheses to the power of n"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>n</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g subscript n equals 16 open parentheses 1 half close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g subscript n equals 4 open parentheses 1 half close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
